title: Old Mill Chance Red Portrait SGC 20 FS/FT
author: Piratedogcardshows

posts.post_title: Old Mill Chance Red Portrait SGC 20 FS/FT
posts.post_content: 75.00 delivered or I am willing to trade for a T206 Revelle or Lipe and of course for any T210 cards. Thanks guys scans available upon request. Please include your email.

Jason, 

Can you update this ( or send me a pm)?  I sent my "I'll take it" PM at the same time you updated your original post to "red portrait" (11:42), so I know I was the first to claim it.  I haven't received a reply yet though.

Sorry to bug you if you're just busy at work or something.  I was just really excited to get this one for my back run (already have the Hindu, so this and the EPDG are the next tough ones to find) and I'm starting to worry after two hours.

Luke

Jason,

My home would make a much better place for this card then Luke's place.  He lives in rainy Seattle while I live up here in sunny Mukilteo:D.

Just joking - nice grab look, Luke - enjoy the card!

Tony
Luke was the first person to message ill take it followed by Tony. I had earlier inquires for scans. Luke pm sent for payment and shipping address info!

Awesome job handling this guys. Great to see. 

Congrats Luke!
